Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人の声
Entry.EnglishText: Woman's Voice

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ
Entry.EnglishText: Selena

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: ……またかよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Not again...

Entry.JapaneseText: やい！ おれに一体、 何をさせようってんだ！ いい加減にしやがれ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! What the hell are you playing at?! Give it a rest, will you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 答えろ！ 答えろよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Answer! Answer me!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大変だ!! ガジュマの奴らが暴動を起こした！ ヒューマと見れば、誰彼かまわず 襲ってやがる！
Entry.EnglishText: This is really bad! The Gajuma have started rioting! They're attacking every Huma in sight!

Entry.JapaneseText: やつら、製鉄工場で働くフリして 武器を作っていたんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: It turns out they were only pretending to do work at the iron factory and were instead making weapons!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだって!? 姉貴は……姉貴はどこだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What the...?! Selena... Where's my sister?

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナなら、さっき家に戻った！ 俺は工場の連中に知らせてくる！
Entry.EnglishText: Selena just went home! I have to let the other guys at the factory know about this!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……バカバカしい…… こんなの幻じゃねえかよ…… こんなのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: This is so absurd... This is just some sort of illusion or...whatever.

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃあぁあっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Aaaaah!

Entry.JapaneseText: チクショウ！ なんだっていうんだよッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Damnit! What the hell's going on?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、<Annie>、 それにクレアさん！ 三人そろって、どうしたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, <Annie>, and Claire too! What are all three of you doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ、さては…… おれの料理が恋しくなったな！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I know... You must be craving some of my cooking!

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ!! おまえも来たか!! ははははは……元気だったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie! You're here too! Hehehe... How's it going?

Entry.JapaneseText: キキッ♪
Entry.EnglishText: Kekee! ♪

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……久しぶりね。 もう、元気になったの？
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... It's been so long. How have you been?

Entry.JapaneseText: あら、どうしたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is something the matter?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……い、いえ…… お、お久しぶりですね……
Entry.EnglishText: N-No... It has been a long time, indeed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ。少し雰囲気が 変わったわね？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. Though, something about you seems a little different...

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、姉貴と別れてから 色々あったもんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, a lot happened since you two last saw each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: それより、何があったんだ？ まさか本当に料理を食いに 来たわけじゃないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Anyway, what's going on? Or did you guys really come all the way here for my cooking?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>がみんなを呼んでいる。 あいつの身に何か起きたようだ。 一緒に来てほしい。
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>'s asking for us. He has something going on with him. You need to come with us.

Entry.JapaneseText: よっしゃ、出発だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Say no more, let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、<Tytree>さん、 そんな簡単に決めていいんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Excuse me, <Tytree>, but can you really decide on something like that so quickly?

Entry.JapaneseText: ただ事じゃないんだろ？ 仲間を助ける時に 迷う理由なんてないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't it obvious? When it comes to helping out a friend, I've got no reason to hesitate.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴、悪いけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Sis, sorry to do this...

Entry.JapaneseText: わかってる。工場の事ね。
Entry.EnglishText: I get it. You're worried about the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長には、<Tytree>は また少し休むって 言っておいてあげるわ。 気をつけて行ってらっしゃい。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll tell the foreman that you'll be taking some more time off. Take care and have a safe trip.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>さん、<Annie>、 弟をよろしくお願いします。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, <Annie>, please look out for my little brother.

Entry.JapaneseText: それからクレア、 くれぐれも気をつけて……
Entry.EnglishText: And you too, Claire. Make sure to stay safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ありがとうございます……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-Thank you very much.

Entry.JapaneseText: で、次は<Hilda>のところか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are we gonna go grab <Hilda>, too?

Entry.JapaneseText: いえ。<Hilda>さんは、 今どこにいるのか……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm afraid not. I don't know where she might be at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……どうするんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Alright... So, now what?

Entry.JapaneseText: とりあえず、この四人で <Eugene>たちのいる バルカへ向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: For now, the four of us are going to Balka to see <Eugene> and <Mao>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:340480>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:340480> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:341080>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:341080> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かあったんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did something happen here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの作業員たちが 工場内で何かしてるらしいの。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like the Gajuma are up to something inside the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街ってガジュマが 少ないじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, there aren't many Gajuma in this city.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、よく知らなかったんだけど、 ガジュマって感じ悪いのね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...So I'm not too familiar with them, but they put me on edge.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街を追い出されて来たのを、 雇ってあげたっていうのに。 何が不満なのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: Even though we gave them jobs after they were kicked out of other towns... I wonder just what their problem is?

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。 あなたのお陰で、話し合いの場が もたれる事になったわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you. It's because of you that we've gotten to where we can finally talk things over.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんだか、 雰囲気が変わったけど、 やっぱりクレアはクレアね。
Entry.EnglishText: Something about you seems different than before, but in the end I guess you're the same old <Claire>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分が責められるかも しれないのに、イチかバチか、 あんな事するなんて。
Entry.EnglishText: Even though you could have gotten in trouble for it, you took your chances and it paid off.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたって、いつでも、 自分よりもみんなの事、 優先しちゃうのね。
Entry.EnglishText: You always put others' needs before your own, don't you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレア……わたくしが……
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>... Am I really...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>アガーテは 称号『<item:10000093>』を取得しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Agarte has received the title "<item:10000093>."
Entry.Notes: idk if that tag is right.

Entry.JapaneseText: こっちは困ってるって 言ってるから、 雇ってやってるのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: They were hired because they said they needed the work.

Entry.JapaneseText: なのに、なんなの、 恩をあだで返すって この事よね。
Entry.EnglishText: I guess this is what they mean when they say no good deed goes unpunished...

Entry.JapaneseText: ほんと、ガジュマって 感じ悪いわ。
Entry.EnglishText: To be honest, I can't say that I feel good about those Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… 大丈夫か？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>... Are you alright?

Entry.JapaneseText: よかったの…… でもセレーナが……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm glad you're okay... But Selena was...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長は…… しょうがなかったんじゃ。 許してやってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory manager... He had no choice. Please forgive him.

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきの突風、 すごかったの
Entry.EnglishText: That gust of wind just now was strong.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの目つきの悪い男…… なかなかやりよる……
Entry.EnglishText: That guy with the mean eyes... He was pretty powerful...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ工場はちゃんと動かんが、 みんなで復旧作業中じゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory is still in disrepair, but we are working together to fix it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシは…… てーぶれーく中じゃー。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, me? I'm just... on my tea break!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>の妙ちきりんな力で 工場は今もあんな状態じゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory is still in disrepair because of <Tytree>'s strange power.

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、もうすぐ使えるようになる。 そしたら、 仕事に精を出すさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we'll get it back up and running soon. Then I can get back to work.

Entry.JapaneseText: べ、別にさぼっとるわけ じゃないんじゃ……！
Entry.EnglishText: I-It's not like I'm just slacking off here, you know?

Entry.JapaneseText: み、見逃してくれんかの……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I'm gonna miss this freedom...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場は無事復旧したんじゃ。 でも人手が足りんのじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory is back up and running, but we're short on manpower.

Entry.JapaneseText: 随時、従業員募集中じゃ。 あんた、時給４５０ガルドで 働いてみんかの？
Entry.EnglishText: We're always looking for new employees. How would you like to work for 450 Gald an hour?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマどもめ、 ざまあみろじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: You Huma are getting what you deserve!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今頃、街の中で仲間が ヒューマどもを メッタメタにしておるわ！
Entry.EnglishText: My friends are making quick work of the Huma still in the city!

Entry.JapaneseText: ようやく工場も復旧じゃ。 でも人手が少々足りんのじゃ。 <Tytree>、早く帰ってこいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory has been repaired, but we're still short on manpower. We need you to come home soon, <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシか？ ワシはてーぶれーく、じゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, me? I'm just... on my tea break!

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場は無事復旧したんじゃ。 でも人手が足りんのじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory is back up and running, but we're short on manpower.

Entry.JapaneseText: 随時、従業員募集中じゃ。 あんた、時給４５０ガルドで 働いてみんかの？
Entry.EnglishText: We're always looking for new employees. How would you like to work for 450 Gald an hour?

Entry.JapaneseText: 街のガジュマが増えて、 工場で働く者の負担も減ったんじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: As the number of Gajuma in this city has increased, our individual workloads have decreased.

Entry.JapaneseText: これで、ワシも心おきなく、 てーぶれーくが楽しめるってもんじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Now, I can enjoy my tea breaks without any worries.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんじゃ？ 工員の募集は終わったぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want? We're not hiring at this moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: 働き口が欲しかったら、 他の街に行った方がいいぞい。
Entry.EnglishText: If you're looking for work, you'll have to go to another city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何しろ、ガジュマが増えて、 働き手には困らなくなったからの。
Entry.EnglishText: After all, with the influx of Gajuma, there is no longer a shortage of workers.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一応、 ヒューマとガジュマの争いは 収まったみたいじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Put simply, it appears that the conflict between Huma and Gajuma has been settled.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、工場長
Entry.EnglishText: But the factory manager
Entry.Notes: Japanese devs accidentally forgor the rest of the line skull emoji

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが増えて、工場長が 色々やりくりに困っとるみたいじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: The boss has been having more and more problems managing things ever since we started having more Gajuma employees.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長とは昔から知り合いだし、 かと言ってガジュマたちの敵には なりとうないし……
Entry.EnglishText: He and I go back a long ways, but I don't want to get on the other Gajumas' bad side...

Entry.JapaneseText: うお…… なんじゃ、これは……
Entry.EnglishText: Whoa... What in the world...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>の分の仕事が 山積になっておる。
Entry.EnglishText: I've got a lot of work planned for you, <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 帰ってきてやらんと、 ますますたまってくぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't come home soon, it'll just keep piling up.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシが変わりに？ ワシはてーぶれーく中じゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: You want me to do it for you? I'm on my tea break.

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々あったが、 ガジュマもヒューマも 仲良くやろうと努力はしておる。
Entry.EnglishText: We have been through a lot, but both Gajuma and Huma are trying their best to work together.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場も順調に 動き出しておるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: The factory is running smoothly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々あったが、 みんな元気に働いているよ。
Entry.EnglishText: A lot has happened, but everyone is getting their work done.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴…… みんなどうしちまったんだよ？ 工場の仕事をほったらかして プラプラしてるなんてさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey sis... What's everyone doing? Everyone's just standing around like there's no work to be done at the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何を言ってるの？ 私たちには私たちの 仕事があるでしょう？ 行くわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about? We have our own work we need to tend to, remember? Let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場内の争いを なんとかできないかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if there's anything I can do about the dispute happening at the factory...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場内で…… 何が起こっているのかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what's going on inside the factory...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場内の争いを なんとかできないかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if there's anything I can do about the dispute happening at the factory...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場内で…… 何が起こっているのかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what's going on inside the factory...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
